template.name: odoo_view_form
template.value: <record id="$view_xmlid$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form> </form> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_view_tree
template.value: <record id="$view_xml_id$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_view_inherit
template.value:
<record id="$view_xmlid$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$inherit_view_xmlid$"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="$expr$" position="">
</xpath> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_action_window
template.value: $action_name$ ir.actions.act_window $model_name$ tree,form

template.name: odoo_security_group
template.value: <record id="" model="res.groups"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="category_id" ref=""/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> </record>

template.name: odoo_security_rule
template.value: <record id="" model="ir.rule"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="model_id" ref="$model_xmlid$"/> <field name="domain_force">[('$field$', '$op$', $value$)]</field> <field name="perm_write" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_create" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="1"/> <!-- You can attach this rule to a specific group, Or make it Global --> <field name="groups" eval="[(4, ref('$group_xmlid$'))]"/> <!--<field name="global" eval="1"/> --> </record>
template.description: Create new Security Rules

template.description: Add new field of type Binary

odoo_view_search

<record id="$search_view_xml_id$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$search_view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search>
</search> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_python_import
template.value: from odoo import models, fields, api

template.name: odoo_action_wizard
template.value: <act_window id="$action_xmlid$" name="$action_name$" res_model="$res_model_name$" binding_model="$binding_model$" view_mode="form" target="new" binding_views="list" groups=""/>

template.name: odoo_form_wizard
template.value:
<record id="$form_view_xml_id$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$form_view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string=""> <group>
</group> <footer> <button type="object" name="$button_name$" string="$button_string$" class="oe_highlight"/> <button special="cancel" string="Cancel"/> </footer> </form> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_model_custom_report
odoo_xml_report
template.value: <!-- string:是报表在菜单上的文字。 --> <!-- name:要写template的xmlid，8、9版本都不能省略模块名。 --> <!-- menu:用于控制是否显示在打印菜单，默认True --> <report id="$id$" model="$model_name$" string="$string$" report_type="qweb-pdf" name="$name$" menu="$menu$"/>

template.name: odoo_template_report
odoo_template_backend_assets
template.value: <template id="assets_backend" name="$name$" inherit_id="web.assets_backend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link rel="stylesheet" href=""/> <script type="text/javascript" src=""/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: odoo_js_define
odoo_template_frontend_assets

template.name: odoo_template_frontend_pos_assets
template.value: <template id="$id$" name="$name$" inherit_id="point_of_sale.assets"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <script type="text/javascript" src="$js_path$"/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: odoo_manifest_cnietech
template.value: { 'name': "$name$", 'version': '1.0', 'depends': [$depends$], 'author': "台州市康尼信息科技有限责任公司", 'website':"http://www.cnietech.com/", 'category': '', 'description': """ $description$ """, 'data': [], 'demo': [], }

template.name: odoo_sql_constraints_with_name_and_code
template.value: _sql_constraints = [ ("name_uniq", "unique (name)", "$model$名称不能重复！"), ("code_uniq", "unique (code)", "$model$编号不能重复！"), ]

template.name: odoo_smart_button_view_something
template.value: <button type="$button_type$" name="$button_name$" class="oe_stat_button" icon="$button_icon$"> <field string="$field_string$" name="$field_name$" widget="statinfo"/> </button>

template.name: odoo_form_debug_div
template.value:
请注意：以下内容是界面上的辅助字段。
在odoo开发者模式下，为了方便程序开发调试，这些内容能看到，正常使用时会隐藏掉。

$field_name_label$：

template.value: <!--请注意：以下的tree和form的xmlid可以不带模块名--> <field name="view_ids" eval="[(5, 0, 0), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'tree', 'view_id': ref('$tree_view_xmlid$')}), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'form', 'view_id': ref('$form_view_xmlid$')})]"/>

template.name: odoo_form_classic_structure
odoo_security_CRUD_groups_technical_role
template.value:
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_acl_R" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ R 组</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">10</field> </record>
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_acl_RU" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ RU 组</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">20</field> </record>
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_acl_CRUD" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ CRUD 组</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">30</field> </record>
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_rule_CRUD_own" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ - 记录规则 - CRUD自己的</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">40</field> </record>
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_rule_CRUD_all" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ - 记录规则 - CRUD所有的</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">50</field> </record>

template.name: odoo_form_setting
template.value: $view_name$ $model_name$

template.name: odoo_action_setting
template.value: <record id="reception_config_settings_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">接待设置</field> <field name="res_model">reception.config.settings</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_reception_config_settings_form"/> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="target">inline</field> </record>

template.name: odoo_xml_record_sequence
template.value: <!-- todo 这个要放在noupdate="1"的data里 --> <record id="$sequence_xml_id$" model="ir.sequence"> <field name="name">$code$</field> <field name="code">$code$</field> <field name="prefix"></field> <field name="padding">4</field> </record>

template.name: odoo_method_name_get
template.value: def name_get(self): return [($record$.id, $record_name$) for $record$ in self]

template.name: odoo_method_default_get
odoo_wizard_method_get_record
odoo_view_inherit_mode_primary
template.value:
<record id="$view_xmlid$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$inherit_view_xmlid$"/> <field name="mode">primary</field> <field name="priority">200</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="$expr$" position="">
</xpath> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_method_name_search
template.value: @api.model def name_search(self, name='', args=None, operator='ilike', limit=100): args = args or [] domain = [] if name: # todo 在这里加入查询的domain # 示例 # domain = [ # "|", "|", # ("theme", operator, name), # ("date", operator, name), # ("name", operator, name) # ] domain = [$domain$] records = self.search(domain + args, limit=limit) return records.name_get()

template.name: odoo_method_create
odoo_x2many_command_4
template.description: Adds an existing record of id id to the set. Can not be used on One2many.

template.name: odoo_wizard_method_get_records
odoo_write
odoo_method_report_render_html
odoo_method_action_view_orders
template.value: @api.multi def action_view_$order_name$_orders(self): u""" 查看单据，如果是单条记录、或者是多条记录，默认显示form、或者tree视图。 :return: dict,临时的一个odoo action """ self.ensure_one() # 要查看的单据 orders = $orders$ # 用于查看的action的xmlid action_xmlid = "$xmlid$" if orders: action = self.env.ref(action_xmlid) action_vals = action.read()[0] context = safe_eval(action_vals.get("context", "{}")) context.update({ # "create": False, # "delete": False, }) action_vals["context"] = context # 如果只是多个单据，则跳转到这个单据的tree视图，用domain过滤想到显示的记录。 if len(orders) > 1: domain = eval(action_vals["domain"]) if action_vals["domain"] else [] domain.append(("id", "in", orders.ids)) action_vals["domain"] = domain # 如果只是一个单据，则跳转到这个单据的form视图。 elif len(orders) == 1: action_vals["view_mode"] = "form" action_vals["views"] = [view for view in action_vals["views"] if view[1] == u"form"] action_vals["res_id"] = orders.id else: action_vals = {'type': 'ir.actions.act_window_close'} return action_vals else: return True
template.description: 查看单据，如果是单条记录、或者是多条记录，默认显示form、或者tree视图。

template.name: odoo_smart_button_do_something
template.value: <button name="toggle_is_signed" type="object" groups="md_sale_base.group_sale_order_sign" class="oe_stat_button" icon="fa-pencil"> <field name="is_signed" widget="boolean_button" options="{'terminology':'sign'}"/> </button>

template.name: odoo_smart_button_archive
template.value: <!--注意：在odoo13版本里，已经不需要这个了，如果当前模型有active字段，则在动作里自动就有归档和取消归档功能--> <button name="toggle_active" type="object" class="oe_stat_button" icon="fa-archive"> <field name="active" widget="boolean_button" options="{'terminology':'archive'}"/> </button>

template.name: odoo_x2many_command_6
template.description: Replaces all existing records in the set by the ids list, equivalent to using the command 5 followed by a command 4 for each id in ids.

template.name: odoo_x2many_command_0
template.description: Adds a new record created from the provided value dict.

template.name: odoo_x2many_command_1
template.description: Updates an existing record of id id with the values in values. Can not be used in create().

template.name: odoo_x2many_command_2
template.description: Removes the record of id id from the set, then deletes it (from the database). Can not be used in create().

template.name: odoo_x2many_command_3
template.description: Removes the record of id id from the set, but does not delete it. Can not be used on One2many. Can not be used in create().

template.name: odoo_x2many_command_5
template.description: Removes all records from the set, equivalent to using the command 3 on every record explicitly. Can not be used on One2many. Can not be used in create().

template.name: odoo_xml_record_precision
template.value: <!-- todo 这个要放在noupdate="1"的data里 --> <record id="$xmlid$" model="decimal.precision"> <field name="name">$name$</field> <field name="digits">6</field> </record>

template.name: odoo_method_fields_view_get
odoo_config_set_xxx
template.value: @api.multi def set_$field_name$(self): u""" 将用户的设置保存到ir.values的默认值设置中。 :return: """ res = self.env['ir.values'].sudo().set_default('$setting_model$', '$field_name$', $value$) return res

odoo_field_name_generate_by_sequence
odoo_model_new_with_lines

template.description: 查看单据，如果是单条记录、或者是多条记录，默认显示form、或者tree视图。

template.name: odoo_interface_return
template.description: 统一接口函数的返回值

template.name: odoo_view_pivot
template.value: <record id="$view_xml_id$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <pivot> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_wizard_reopen
template.value: def reopen(self): action = self.env.ref("$action$").read()[0] action["res_id"] = self.id return action

template.name: odoo_xlsxwriter_BytesIO
template.value:
import io import xlsxwriter
file_data = io.BytesIO() workbook = xlsxwriter.Workbook(file_data) sheet = workbook.add_worksheet("$sheet$")
